column3: This file defines how each iFIX tag type is represented in the OPC UA server, including
the representation of its 'Value' data variable.

column4: - The name displayed for the tag type when browsing the OPC UA server

column3: - The OPC UA variable type of the 'Value' child for tags of this type.  Valid values:

column8: - TextOrNoValue (string value, or no 'current value' for this tag type)

column4: - The datatype of the 'Value' child for tags of this type, RESTRICTED BY VARIABLETYPE.

column5: - Indicates whether the tag type's 'Value' child represents a single value or array of values.

column4: - Only used for 'OneDimensionArray' Rank tag types.  Indicates the maximum possible number

column6: of elements in the tag type's 'Value' array.

column4: - Specifies the Read/Write access to be applied to the tag type's 'Value' child.  This access

column6: level is enforced by the OPC UA server, and does not necessarily represent the actual level
of access to the underlying tag's current value in iFIX.  iFIX determines the actual level
of access to a tag's value.  Valid values:

column8: - NoAccess (read and write not allowed or not possible, such as for a tag

column11: type which does not have a F_CV/E_CV/A_CV field)
